content: 2 extra single_crochet and in the very next stitch start the next round 8 2 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 36 9 3 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 42 10 4 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 48 11 5 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 54 12 6 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 60 place a stitch marker in between stitch 4 and 5 of round 15 place a 2nd stitch marker 32 stitches away from the 1st stitch marker this is to mark where your eyes should go this is an approximate point you may need to adjust once you start the decreasing rounds 13-19 single_crochet in each st around change to color b 21-27 single_crochet in each st around stuff the fish as you work place eyes between rounds 15 and 16 leaving 32 holes in between them you might have to adjust placement after row 30 make sure you look at the eyes and see how they look if you want the sunken eye look do not place the backs until round 33 28 18 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 56 29 17 single_crochet decrease 7 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 52 30 16 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 48 31 15 single_crochet decrease 5 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 44 32 14 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 40 33 13 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet x 3 decrease 10 single_crochet= 36 sweet oddity art 5 body continued now for the eyes stuff the head well place the eyelashes inside the eye along the edge cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it 34 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 35 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 36-37 single_crochet in each st around 38 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 39-44 single_crochet in each st around change to color a fold the tail in half single_crochet the tail together to close the tail = 9 chain 1 turn increase across= 18 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 18 chain 1 turn increase across= 36 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 36 chain 1 turn increase across= 72 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 72 f/o and weave in the ends sweet oddity art 6 eyes sweet oddity
